name: PublishScheduledShift
description:
Publish a scheduled shift to make it official.

Use this tool to publish a scheduled shift, confirming its details. The draft shift details are finalized and moved to the published shift details, marking the shift as official.

parameters.name: scheduled_shift_id
parameters.description: The ID of the scheduled shift to publish.

value_schema.description: The ID of the scheduled shift to publish.

parameters.name: unique_idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique identifier for ensuring the idempotency of the publish request. Prevents duplicate operations if the request is retried.

value_schema.description:
A unique identifier for the `PublishScheduledShift` request, used to ensure the
[idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency)
of the operation.

parameters.name: current_shift_version
parameters.description: The current version of the scheduled shift for optimistic concurrency control. If it doesn't match the server version, the request fails.

value_schema.description:
The current version of the scheduled shift, used to enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control. If the provided version doesn't match the server version, the request fails.
If omitted, Square executes a blind write, potentially overwriting data from another publish request.

parameters.name: notification_audience
parameters.description: Specify who receives email notifications when a scheduled shift is published. Options are: ALL, AFFECTED, NONE.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether Square sends an email notification to team members
when a scheduled shift is published and which team members receive the notification.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

of the operation.

parameters.description:
The current version of the scheduled shift, used to enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control. If the provided version doesn't match the server version, the request fails.
If omitted, Square executes a blind write, potentially overwriting data from another publish request.

value_schema.description:
The current version of the scheduled shift, used to enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control. If the provided version doesn't match the server version, the request fails.
If omitted, Square executes a blind write, potentially overwriting data from another publish request.

parameters.description:
Indicates whether Square sends an email notification to team members
when a scheduled shift is published and which team members receive the notification.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether Square sends an email notification to team members
when a scheduled shift is published and which team members receive the notification.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
